item.title: The Bean Machine
item.description: Staying Focused On Being Yourself Here is something to think about. What does it mean to be normal? The picture below is a picture of a bean machine, also known as a Quincunx, a Dalton Board, or Plinko. What happens to the ball when it gets dropped into the top of the bean machine? It gets bounced around right? Does the ball get to choose in which slot it will end up?
